title.rendered: 45 Most Popular & Best WordPress Themes of 2020

content.rendered:
Looking for the most popular and best WordPress themes out there? In this post, we have showcased the most popular themes you find today that are still actively updated and maintained.

One of the first things you need to think about when you start your online business venture is how your site is going to look. It’s crucial to offer high-quality content that engages the audience. For that, you will need a premium theme.

If you don’t have any background in site administration, the best platform for your site is WordPress. Lack of experience is not the only reason for which you should choose WordPress and your site’s platform. This content management system is also time-saving, highly organized and reliable. These features are the reasons for which WordPress is the most popular CMS on the internet. Both experienced and newbie site administrators and web designers are using it for their sites.

In the following paragraphs, you will be able to read all about the most popular premium WordPress themes. Our short reviews will help you decide the themes that best fits for you. Each of them has specific features that will be useful for the kind of site you want to run. All are easily customizable and adaptive for any purpose. You will surely find the perfect premium WordPress theme for your website in this collection!

Let’s have a look at the most popular and best WordPress themes you can install today.

Oshine

Oshine is probably one of the best WordPress themes for a vast range of website applications, from business to corporate, personal to commercial, sizes big and small. This theme is built with unique and powerful capabilities for a static website, single-page website and static webpage creation, in a swift, efficient manner that is intuitive and easy and requires absolutely no coding skills whatsoever.

Generate gorgeous, professional-looking static layouts. Make use of Oshine’s amazing dozen pre-included demos, seamlessly compose expansive Parallax static, high-resolution vistas that bedazzle your visitors in the background. You could also engage them with locally or remotely hosted static Parallax video backgrounds. Make static Parallax headers, sections, page titles—you name it, Oshine will make it static, well-designed, functional and aesthetic. Furthermore, Oshine’s custom Drag & Drop visual page builder empowers anyone to create incredible layouts from scratch or based off of Oshine’s sophisticated templates. Tons of premium slider features like Master Slider, Carousel Slider, and Full Screen Slider persistently simplify the display of great amounts of content in your single page or static website. Dress to impress with Oshine, and outshine the competition!

More info / Download Demo

Divi

Divi is the most popular WordPress theme ever released with over 800,000 users worldwide. The motto of this theme is “The sky is the limit”. Upon installation of this theme, you will understand why. It offers you unlimited customization features and superior functionality. You can only achieve this by hiring a professional web developer. So let’s take a look at the most noticeable features brought by Divi:

The Divi Builder is a feature that will help you create the layout of your dreams. The common problem with most of the builders from other themes is that they only allow you to customize layouts and skins within some limits. What’s more, the Divi layout builder will give you the ability to change anything in your layout; from colors and icons, to page and post formats. This is the only way to create a dynamic interface without writing a single line of code. Furthermore, the layout builder is based on a Drag & Drop interface, so even your kids or grandparents will be able to use it.

In case you just want something functional and engaging, Divi has the solution. It features 18 pre-set layouts, allowing you to install the theme and start uploading content in less than an hour. The design of this theme is extremely responsive. Regardless of the style you want to approach when you will build your website, this theme will be efficient. It offers you a great exposure by being accessible from any device and browser out there. The design will automatically resize itself to fit any screen size, regardless of its operating system. For more information about this awesome WordPress theme, you can read our full review here.

More info / Download Demo

Soledad

Soledad is the most popular WordPress blog theme that covers every category from a simple personal food blog to a tech news site.

Would you spend money on a bland, sub-standard WordPress theme? All consumers want the biggest bang for their buck, and only themes like Soledad can live up to everyone’s expectations. When your product holds a WordPress sales record, you must be doing something right. The response of those who have purchased this theme is actually positive. Its quality design has impressed veterans and novice users alike. This undeniable popularity is justified by a large selection of remarkable features. The theme layout is responsive towards high-resolution Retina devices and most web browsers.  In total, there are more than 200 blog layout and slider combination options.

Over 250 home page demos are available for all users. They can serve as a template for your own designs, or they can be installed directly. Soledad has 5 article layouts, 3 sidebar layouts, and 6 portfolio variations. Users will also gain access to a massive color palette and a stunning website gallery. An online documentation source is available for those who wish to learn more about their site. It is very informative and well-written. Thanks to the WordPress Live Customizer feature, you can preview all changes before you apply them. This encourages creativity by making it easier to correct mistakes.

More info / Download Demo

Jevelin – Best WordPress Theme

Jevelin is one of the highest-rated premium WordPress themes you can get today. It performs at a top-notch level as a multipurpose website with deep-running customization capacities and an intuitive visual page-building process that webmasters can easily master. Here we have a perfect theme for personal, professional, business or corporate websites.

Chock-full of predesigned layouts, professionally styled demo websites and functional and articulate webpage templates, Jevelin has the stuff you need to bring your projects firmly into the 21st century. Bloggers find in Jevelin a peculiarly comfortable space where they can effortlessly disseminate their views and spread the word on their thoughts, photography, videos or general content through a veritable cornucopia of fine-tuning possibilities available through advanced admin tools and page building settings for each and every element within their Jevelin blog websites. Packing six different blog layouts, multiple custom post styles and sophisticated features like Back to Top interfaces and dynamic categories, content carousels and Slider Revolution-powered sliders, no theme can get your point across like Jevelin can. Give Jevelin a go today, and feel the difference!

More info / Download Demo

Kalium


Kalium is one of the best themes on WordPress, perfectly suited for portfolios and blogs. Both potential employers and customers will be amazed, as they navigate your well-designed, streamlined page. If you wish to learn more about this theme, you can consult its extensive and highly informative documentation. In addition, there is a live demo along with some screenshots. Your site will be highly customizable, as you can alter or change every element.

The addition of the valuable Revolution Slider allows you to display artful content in the best ways possible. You have the opportunity to create eye-catching slides, proving to your followers that you are worthy of their consideration. Also, you may add custom animation, effects, and transitions. There are several portfolio variations, allowing you to showcase each content element in a different style. This will provide a refreshing browsing experience for readers, resulting in a larger view count for your posts.

There are many hover styles to choose from, and you can control the amount of information that is presented. Kalium even allows users to link their personal sites with their portfolio, without the need to create multiple accounts. There is no specialized knowledge needed, and pages can be created very easily. This eliminates the need to hire web development companies. Kalium has included over 600 Google fonts which can be accessed from the Google Fonts Directory.

More info / Download Demo

TheGem

TheGem has been developed by a dedicated team of coders and designers working in unison to provide you with a robust and reliable framework for the development of all kinds of websites. It best suits professional portfolios as well as personal or corporate blog websites, with dozens of dedicated layout designs for each that you can easily customize through the WPBakery Page Builder.

TheGem also has plenty of conceptual demo websites for businesses, gyms, spa centers, creative design agencies, online stores powered by the integrated WooCommerce eCommerce plugin suite visually styled to match your TheGem website. It also includes many more template pages than you’ll know what to do with, ensuring you always find what you need to make your content shine. With TheGem, mobile-friendliness is at the core of things, owing to TheGem’s robust Bootstrap roots, which also furnish staunch cross-compatibility across all browsers and devices. Regardless of the project on your hands, TheGem has what you need to succeed. Try it today!

More info / Download Demo

Webify


It is pretty obvious that Webify is becoming one of the most popular WordPress themes out there. With the very many features and functions, anyone can effortlessly take it to their advantage. Speaking of which, Webify is a multi-functional site skin with a whopping collection of twenty neat, modern and sophisticated demos. In addition to that, Webify also includes all the other content for a super-fast realization of your ideal online presence. To sum up, with Webify, you can establish pages for businesses, agencies, freelancers, bloggers, online store owners; well, let’s just make it short and say that Webify is for everyone.

Some more features of Webify are parallax effect, over two hundred shortcodes, compatibility with WPML for translation and mega menu. Documentation and support are also on point for you to never feel lonely on your journey to a victorious launch of your online space.

More info / Download Demo

Uncode

Uncode is yet another very popular high quality WordPress theme that focuses on a clean and beautiful design. The tool is decked out with an amazing set of tools and features that make churning highly interactive pages and websites an easy task.

This theme is powered by the latest and greatest web development technologies, incorporating HTML5 coding, polished and customizable CSS3 styling and modular Bootstrap design in a seamless, put together and completely gorgeous presentation that is easily digested by users across all market segments. It also has a focus on legibility and brand identity, with extensively customizable typographical options and advanced color schemes. Uncode is efficiently coded to load fast and be easy on servers, meaning it is great for slower connections. It is also very social media friendly, allowing for virilization of content and maximized exposure. Uncode is a theme that lets you build websites that people can enjoy and want to share with others immediately. If you have something to say and need a beautiful soapbox to say it from, Uncode is your theme.

More info / Download Demo

Total

Total has been developed to perform at top level across a multitude of fields and industries with utter ease and intuitiveness, requiring absolutely no coding in order to furnish webmasters with professional quality websites filled with resourceful features built right into the theme and much more under the hood.

This theme deploys the WPBakery Page Builder, which provides both front-end and backend page design and layout customization solutions you can make use of quickly and effortlessly. Total is a truly flexible framework for constructing articulate websites packed with modern features such as amazing ready-made premium sliders powered by the Revolution Slider and the Layer Slider plugins, as well as impressive Mega Menus with plentiful options for customization, combined with a potent and speedy Theme Customizer that makes short work of most website building tasks. Total also includes multiple page templates and live demo websites you can deploy within a few clicks, completely prepared with inner content pages, sidebars and menus ready to go from day one. Check out Total today!

More info / Download Demo

Argenta

Argenta is a multi-purpose and multi-function WordPress theme with a wide selection of topics. It comes with pre-manufactured demos that can adapt to contexts unlike others. Its main purpose is comfort and simplicity for the client. Argent has lots premade layouts to help make quicker selections. It provides a masonry grid layout with lots of pre-built headers choices. To get clients shopping you have AJAX cart and WooCommerce integration. Get online stores with quick product preview an image slider.

Argenta has several menu and blogs pages, you will also find a special showcase project page. Social media “share” buttons can be found on headers and footers. Argenta uses Slide Revolution and it is Retina-ready. This will make your mobile experience the best possible. Posts have five formats including gallery, video and audio. Argenta has lots icons and it is animations compatible. It is WPML compatible and also uses RTL feature. Doubts can be handled with its 5 star rated custom support available with submit. You can also get constant updates automatically. Argenta is meant to make customers feel guided and taken care of throughout their visit. Get creative and discover the wonders of Argenta!

More info / Download Demo

Composer

In its one year since its launch, Composer has been extremely acclaimed. It has more than 75 demos available in a quick install. With plenty of business demos for services or shops, Composer simply gives you the opportunity to create a unique and successful business website.

This theme is compatible with premium plugins at no extra cost, such as WPBakery Page Builder and Revolution Slider. This means effortless, customizable and beautiful slides and no coding requirement! WooCommerce integration allows for setting up shopping centers and carts. Your business could even reach audiences from around the world with no language barriers, through WPML compatibility!

Composer is Retina-ready and has a responsive layout that perfectly fits any screen size or device. It also offers unlimited, changeable elements, from multiple headers, colors, to fonts entire customization. Creating your dream website has never been this easy! Choose between hundreds of shortcodes to do your work fast and easy. With Composer, you get constant updates, new features, detailed documentation, and dedicated support. Get this 5-star-rated awesome tool! Get Composer today!

More info / Download Demo

Massive Dynamic

Massive Dynamic is an unimaginably flexible platform for the development of beautiful, attractive websites across a wide range of possible industries and fields. This theme keeps the website design and building process streamlined and simplified through the real-time Live Website Builder, integrating shortcode deployment and configuration, layout edition and settings configuration into a dynamic, visual interface.

Massive Dynamic offers a range of customized, professionally designed templates and demo pages and websites for specific niche and general market applications, from corporate and commercial to business or even personal creative or professional websites. When you import templates in Massive Dynamic, they include all configuration settings, plugins and shortcodes, readily functional then and there. Adding some customization, including over a dozen eye-catching header designs and a dynamic header customization technology, and Massive Dynamic gets you from concept to live website in the blink of an eye. E-Commerce support and functionality fully included out of the box, makings things even easier. What’s not to love?

More info / Download Demo

Stockholm


Why is Stockholm a popular WordPress theme? It is due to its remarkable and impressive multi-concept approach. In other words, Stockholm is a multi-purpose theme which you can use for building personal, eCommerce, agency, fashion, wedding and hotel websites to name a few. With your added signature touch, you can go way above that and create a web space that goes entirely against the norm. However, if you want a quick page fix, go with any of the included professional demos, edit it with your images and texts and that’s it.

As far as the features go, you guessed it, Stockholm has very many. Drag and drop page builder, Slider Revolution, flexible-header, Twitter and Instagram feeds, parallax effects and oh so much more. Whatever your idea might be, it is Stockholm that will help you bring it to life. Waste no time and begin now.

More info / Download Demo

Shopkeeper

If you are looking for a trendy website template for your online store or any online business website, Shopkeeper is the perfect choice for you. This theme has a fluid layout that adjust slickly on different types of devices and screen sizes. It is perfect for novice as well as seasoned website developers as it is packed with amazing features and customization options that help you build an appealing website for your business. Shopkeeper also offers several pre-made page layouts that helps you craft an attractive website in a jiffy. Shopkeeper allows you to design the header of the theme to suit your brand. You can take advantage its fullscreen slider in displaying your company logo to make customers remember your brand. You can also use the broad slider in promoting your products, special packages or other services. Producing beautiful and responsive slideshows is very easy with Slider Revolution.

Shopkeeper is also bundled with WPBakery Page Builder to help you add and organize several design elements in your website using the drag and drop page builder. This theme also comes with countless custom widgets and oodles of powerful shortcodes that allow developers add advance theme elements in your website. It is a great choice for people who would like to sell their products online because it supports WooCommerce plugin. This theme makes it easier for you to market your product online and reach a wider range of audience, thanks to its solid social media integration.

More info / Download Demo

Consulting

Consulting is a super versatile and adaptive WordPress theme for business, finance, well, the options are endless. In the bundle, you will find a whopping collection of over forty demos, which cover pretty much anything and everything. But the fun does not end here. With the convenient drag and drop technique, you can modify Consulting to the very last detail. For your information, Consulting works flawlessly, both with Elementor and WPBakery page builders.

Over eight different practical layouts, header builder, multi-location Google Maps, Slider Revolution and 250 and counting shortcodes, this and heaps more is what you receive with Consulting. Needless to say, Consulting is high-performing and fast loading across all devices and web browsers, as well as SEO-ready. And if you ever find yourself in need of additional assistance, the documentation and friendly support team are also always at your disposal. Take your consulting business to new levels of success with a well-thought-out website, thanks to Consulting.

More info / Download Demo

Appilo


Appilo is a highly resourceful WordPress theme that comes ideal for building a striking and impactful landing page. Whether this be for an application or for a business, Appilo covers them both and then some. With eleven and counting predefined demos, you can quickly find the right look for your objective. Still, there is no need to go with the default settings to a tee. Appilo comes coupled with the Elementor drag and drop page builder, so you know making adjustments will be a little breeze.

Appilo is also entirely in tune with all modern devices and web browsers, guaranteeing excellent performance at all times. Every user also profits from the professional support team and a lifetime worth of updates, which keep your website running smoothly for years to come. Start on the internet like a champ with Appilo and enjoy the remarkable outcome.

More info / Download Demo

Ekko

Without a shadow of a doubt, Ekko is one of the most popular WordPress themes that you can currently find on the market. It is a tool that you can utilize for building just about any website you fancy. It is a multi-purpose theme that caters to all industries and niches. Keep in mind, in the bundle, you will discover a whopping collection of fifty and counting full demo websites that you can put into practice out of the box. On top of that, Ekko also comes with over two hundred blocks and more than forty elements. Like that would not be enough, Ekko is coupled with the drag and drop page builder, too.

Whether you are creating your first or your tenth website, with Ekko, everyone succeeds. This killer solution offers you unlimited possibilities, so you come up with the exact website that you fancy. No coding knowledge and no prior experience necessary.

More info / Download Demo

Norebro

Norebro is one of the most popular WordPress themes with the ability to create almost any type of website you are after. From blogs and online shops to web agency and corporate pages, you can do them all with Norebro. You have all the content and the must-have features at your service, you only need to put them to use. Bringing into being the unique project page you are willing to launch is closer than ever when you unlock yourself access to Norebro.

With a creative and modern theme like Norebro, you can answer all your questions and ease up the site development process. The theme is mobile-ready and compatible with all the modern web browsers. No matter what your final web creation will look like, it will always smoothly and instantly adjust to any screen size. No coding skill required, premium plugins bundle for free, over thirty pre-built demos and first-class performance, Norebro is no joke.

More info / Download Demo

KALLYAS

KALLYAS is a solution to a vast array of problems, being a capable, intuitive website building platform with the flexibility and thorough resourcefulness to flawlessly service a huge range of diverse website niches, needs profiles and usage cases with impeccable performance, owing to its vast collection of templates, pages, demo websites, and layouts, it’s user-friendly and amazingly convenient in-house developed Visual Builder page editor, further empowered by the engagingly smooth Revolution Slider.

With these tools at your disposal as well as over 100 unique, customizable elements ripe with plentiful configuration choices and styles, every website built with KALLYAS will always be unique and unrepeatable. Thoroughly out of the box functional online store template pages make KALLYAS a gifted salesman and a natural theme for running all sorts of online stores and commercial operations, while laboriously designed portfolio styles and layouts offer a prime platform for professionals looking to project their capacities to potential employers in a sleek, memorable presentation. Breath-taking Parallax visual effects and modern one-page website capabilities further add to what KALLYAS can let you accomplish. Try KALLYAS today!

More info / Download Demo

Avada

Avada is a great theme that will work well for any kind of site you want to use. From personal blogs and online portfolios, to the agency or niche news websites, you can design all projects around this premium WordPress site. As one of the most sold WordPress theme, there are more than 80,000 websites currently using it. However, that doesn’t mean your site won’t be able to stand out from the crowd. Even if tens of thousands of sites use Avada, you don’t find two of them to look the same. That’s because each of them was customized through the Fusion Builder, an easy to use and efficient visual page builder. This page builder helps you achieve a unique layout in a couple of hours.

If dynamic elements are what you looking for, Avada theme comes with several premium sliders. On top of that, you will be able to choose from 5 different header designs. It’s normal to worry when you see so many customization features and you have no previous experience with WordPress websites. That’s not a problem with Avada, because the company producing it has created a dedicated customer support. No matter what problem you might stumble upon, the support center will assist you in sorting everything out.

The Avada theme is also a great choice for the cases when you want to start selling products or services. Its design works perfectly with ecommerce plugins, such as WooCommerce. Bottom-line, regardless of your online business plan, Avada is one of the options you should consider. It’s customizable, responsive and multi-purpose, the key features a theme should have.

More info / Download Demo

Infinite

Infinite is a WordPress theme of multiple purposes. It works smoothly with many premium plugins and features. You will love its flexibility and customizable panel. Infinite has many layout variations to select from for different purposes. You will find it adaptable to all posting formats needs and very responsive. Infinite has an incredible speed performance tested by Google and it is SEO improved. Colors are customized with skins sections into unlimited variations. Infinite uses integrated fonts and icons and even features a font uploader. It also handles many social media buttons and/or widgets.

It even is WPML compatible for all text posts translations. Infinite can create thumbnails to fit portfolio, blog, or gallery elements. Set up shops if you are building a business page with WooCommerce support. You will also want to use the special top bar that you can enable on top of headers. General design is very responsive, but also has speed and SEO enhancements (performance is great!). Infinite lets you put to the test your creative ideas in real-time with a beautiful live customizer. Backgrounds get their special touch with LightBox and additional CSS files and animations. Try now an incredible demo with just one click! Try Infinite!

More info / Download Demo

Hongo


Hongo is one of the most popular WordPress themes, exclusive for establishing outstanding online stores. Thanks to WooCommerce integration, ready-made demos and page layouts and WPBakery, anyone and everyone can now create a dream eCommerce website. With little work and time, you can now start pushing products of all types and start your journey to success.

For your information, you will find eleven different demos that take care of fashion, furniture, jewelry, lingerie, watch and electronic stores, to name a few. With your touch of creativity, you can expand the possibilities of Hongo over and beyond. Like that would not be enough, you can also expect new samples to drop with upcoming demos.

Hongo also includes over two hundred useful elements and more than 125 practical inner pages. The layout of the theme is also entirely flexible and responsive, fast loading and compatible with browsers. Ensure a spectacular shopping experience with Hongo.

More info / Download Demo

XStore

XStore has been created through a lengthy design and development process to be the end all, be all theme for successful online commercial ventures of all kinds, sizes large and small, with seamless functionality and utter ease. With XStore, rookies and veterans can equally craft the most engaging modern online shops in a matter of minutes, without ever having to so much as look at a single line of code.

XStore packs a powerful set of premium plugins that streamline and simplify the website building experience, including the resourceful WPBakery Page Builder plugin, as well as the Slider Revolution and Contact Form 7 plugins, which make short work of most design tasks. Not to mention, XStore’s generous collection of professionally designed website templates, all of which can be readily imported with a single click, is jam-packed with innovative designs and layouts for modern stores of all kinds and niches. Artisans and handcrafted creators love XStore because it lets them market their wares from day one, through a seamless, professional interface. Try XStore now!

More info / Download Demo

Specular

With Specular, you can sit back and relax, and let the wonderful features packed within this theme do their magic and set you up with professional quality portfolio websites, of which Specular includes over 30 demos of, as well as 8 different blog styles, an integrated, customized version of WPBakery Page Builder built just for Specular, jaw-dropping Parallax sections and visual effects, Revolution Slider, Layer Slider, elegant header options and unique layouts. Specular has all the right tools for webmasters to create one of a kind business websites ready to hit the road and start marketing your products and services from day one. Try Specular now!

More info / Download Demo

Werkstatt

Werkstatt is a pliable platform for articulating resourceful websites with ease and speed. With this theme, all you need is a few clicks to customize everything. Style your sections and elements, fine-tune your modules and pages. All within the comfort of your advanced theme settings and the WPBakery Page Builder. No coding ability is necessary to make use of Werkstatt to its fullest extent. With impressive documentation, Werkstatt lets you find your way about its features intuitively.

Top-notch customer support is available around the clock for your every need. Dozens of templates and layouts allow you to hit the ground running. No matter what the application is, Werkstatt has you covered with plentiful options. Businesses, professionals, freelancers and bloggers find a solid, robust ally in Werkstatt. Unique portfolio features allow you to showcase your content in an attractive presentation. Impress your audience with seamless transitions and animations. Engage them with over 750 animated icons to play with. Also, express yourself with hundreds of custom Google Fonts and endless colors. To conclude, Werkstatt is simply every website you’ve ever wanted, all at your disposal. Give Werkstatt a shot today, and check it out!

More info / Download Demo

Sassico


Startups, agencies and other tech projects in between, Sassico is the versatile and multi-purpose WordPress theme that does the trick. In the bundle, you will find an array of different one- and multi-page home page demos. On top of that, Sassico also comes with plenty more inner pages for your convenience. Every layout works fantastically well out of the box due to the clean and creative look. For everyone who likes to change and improve things, you can customize Sassico, too. With the Elementor page builder, of course! In other words, without the need to write code.

Moreover, Sassico includes twelve headers, five footers, mega menu, over forty custom-made add-ons, more than two hundred blocks and Slider Revolution. Due to its resourcefulness, you will find nothing missing in the Sassico package.

More info / Download Demo

Blobie


Blobie is a popular WordPress theme for all sorts of creative ventures. With the twelve ready-made demos, you can create websites for agencies, online portfolios, freelancers, marketers and many more in between. The creativity and adaptability of Blobie know no bounds. You can now start turning head online sooner rather than later – let Blobie do the trick and amaze everyone. And that is something it does professionally, helping you win over more potential clients.

The collection of goodies that you get with Blobie is vast. From WPBakery page builder and Slider Revolution to fast loading speed, search engine optimization, mega menu and widgets, Blobie rocks it all and plenty more. Start on the web strong with a striking website that will scale your project and boost it through the roof.

More info / Download Demo

NeoMag


For news and online magazines, NeoMag is one of the most popular WordPress themes you can currently find on the market. It comes with four main samples, covering entertainment, business, art and politics. Of course, the options and possibilities with NeoMag are endless. In other words, you can utilize the tool for building both niche or general newspaper websites with no trouble. Keep in mind, NeoMag is very minimal and neat, catering to all sorts of intentions out of the box already.

With NeoMag, you have complete creative control, allowing you to alter it precisely to your needs and wants. It comes with six different headers, sticky sidebars, smooth load, back to top button, sticky navigation and seven editable sections on the home page. Get things moving forward with NeoMag and start on the internet like a pro from the beginning.

More info / Download Demo

Merchandiser

Merchandiser is a sound and effective tool for webmasters to easily put together modern websites focusing on eCommerce and with a full range of product display features and advanced shopping cart capabilities within a few minutes.

This theme has every plugin you need to quickly put together sophisticated pages and a wealth of predesigned template layouts to choose from, if you don’t feel up for starting from scratch. Online shop pages, individual product pages, online catalogues with a selection of visualization and pagination choices, animations and transitions, and much more, coupled with charming features like the Off-Canvas Shopping Cart and Off-Canvas Quick View for individual products, and breath-taking product Image Galleries, and you begin to have an idea of why Merchandiser is such an effective tool for the modern online salesman or marketer. Add your content, do your thing, and Merchandiser will take care of the rest!

More info / Download Demo

Intact

Intact is a multipurpose WordPress theme ideal for you as a magical master tool. It is completely customizable and has absolute compatibility with most WordPress incredible plugins. You will find many unique specialized demos of a one-click install. A variety of homepages and pre-built layout options will also be available. Intact, uses famous WPBakery Page Builder and Revolution Slider as basic makeup. However, you get integration of features such as Lightbox, Contact Form 7 and Google Maps.

It is a Redux framework based theme, improved for both speed and search engines. Even a child theme is available! Intact has full browsers compatibility and is responsive to all screens and devices. Layouts can handle many different formats for posting. Within them, there are more than 5 layout designs made for portfolio posts. Intact has CSS3 animations integrated along with some galleries features too. You will also find +600 Google Fonts to use and footers to customize. Admin panel for this theme is easy to use thanks to its clean and clear code. It is responsive, flexible, all screens and devices adapted. Intact is a theme thought for customization and versatility as its main advantages. Get started with this mind-blowing theme filled of options. Get Intact.

More info / Download Demo

Amax

Amax is a theme for WordPress that can be used for any site. It is packed with practical options, and it boasts a modern design that will certainly attract many viewers. If you want to learn more about this innovative product, be sure to view the theme overview video. It displays Amax’s main features, and demonstrates the benefits of applying it to your site. It is an authentic multi-purpose theme, due to the inclusion of very flexible website building tools. Amax can help you achieve you goals, regardless of your line of work. You can change the fonts and color palettes of the page, while selecting multiple headers, titles and site layouts. You will be given complete creative control. This guarantees that your page will be distinct, increasing brand recognition.

Amax lets customers design an endless number of different pages via the built-in WPBakery Page Builder. If you wish to avoid the hassle of having to design them, you can always use one of the demo pages that are included with the download. This theme has added a popular plugin for video page building. All elements can be styled, and many additional elements were incorporated. Amax is completely responsive, able to work on all screens. If you want to find out more about this theme you can read this review.

More info / Download Demo

Veda

Veda is a multipurpose WordPress theme meant for large scale business. It provides more than 20 unique demos and expects to have more on the way. It features 2 premium quality sliders and many compatible plugins. Veda is WooCommerce-ready and open to socializing through bbPress and BuddyPress. It even provides Zopim live chat. Layout is modifiable and very easy to customize. Veda is a theme built with WPBakery Page Builder and Buddha Panel framework. Its tons of shortcodes make it very accessible and easy to understand. On the design you get awesome color management and galleries.

Veda is Retina-ready, supports high resolution and Parallax effect. It uses over 600 Google Fonts, Fonts Awesome and a fonts uploader. Other design features include HTML5 and CSS3 animations and many icons. Veda uses WPML and RTL support as well as Contact Form 7 compatibility. It even includes speed and SEO improvements! You can re-publish posts through many social platforms. Veda means to be versatile providing the most important features for online business. Give a chance to this awesome flexible utensil and get your site up! Get Veda!

More info / Download Demo

Brixton

Brixton is a theme that has been created with a dashing sense of style that is sure to dazzle and impress your audience, regardless of the nature, niche, and specifics of your personal or corporate blog website.

This theme has all the features and tools required to help you produce the most polished and professional-looking blog websites around. Made to be readable, Brixton has been laid out in a series of unique and creative iterations that will definitely make a memorable impact with your viewers, which, combined with Brixton’s extensive search engine optimization out of the box, makes Brixton a solid theme to dominate the ranks within weeks of launching your blog. Absolutely you don’t need any coding experience to get the most out of Brixton, with its clean and crisp, CSS3-powered smooth transitions and animations as well as its powerful HTML5 elements and Bootstrap framework completely at your fingertips through the entire process.

More info / Download Demo

Salient

This premium WordPress theme offers a beautiful and impressive look for your site, which is one of the ways through which you can retain traffic. The feature that separates this theme from the rest is the video background. You might not like it so much when you will first install it, because of the dull standard color scheme.

Even if this is a premium theme, there are only two blog styles available, a masonry style and a general style. Also, there is only an online shop style available with this theme, but it’s a very nice looking theme. The portfolio layout of this theme will allow you to display your projects in an organized way. The customization of this theme is impressive when it comes to colors typography and layout. In case you never customized a theme before, the extended HD video documentation of Salient will come in handy.

The whole design of Salient is ultra-responsive and Retina-ready, offering you a site that you can access from any device, no matter the size or technology of its screen. You will be able to choose from a collection of over 350 Retina-ready icons and eight-page layouts. Your site can be full-width or boxed, and this modification can be done with a click of a button. When will from full-width to boxed, or vice-versa, all the elements of the site will automatically adapt.

More info / Download Demo

The7

The7 is one of the most popular themes ever released. Since its launch, the designers of this theme have developed and fixed more than 100 features and bugs. They won’t start here and the theme will keep on improving every month, putting all the updates at your disposal, for free. Even if the theme is very popular you will be able to achieve a unique website because of the easy-to-customize layout and skins.

WPBakery Page Builder is a premium plugin that will help you easily build any layout you have in mind. Besides the WPBakery Page Builder, you will also get the premium versions of Slider Revolution, Go Responsive Pricing & Compare Tables and the Layer Slider, all of them for free.

As every theme should be, The7 is fully responsive, designed to be displayed and accessed from any mobile and desktop device. The installation of this theme is simple and straightforward. Once you buy it, you will get a .zip file that you need to upload to WordPress. Then you will just need to activate it from the appearance section of your dashboard’s menu.

More info / Download Demo

Brooklyn

The creators of Brooklyn are advertising it as the last theme you will never need to buy. They are basing this affirmation on the fact that Brooklyn offers all features and customization options needed within a multipurpose theme. The theme is modern, minimal, elegant and extremely engaging. It was first created as an interface for presentation sites, but the updates and the latest development campaigns, turned it into a premium WordPress theme. Basically, Brooklyn is a legion of themes sold in a package. Let’s take a look at what’s exactly included in this package.

The Brooklyn theme is built on the ZURB Foundation framework, which makes it one of the most responsive themes on the market. From classic desktops to the iPhone 6 Plus and the latest Windows tablets, any device will be able to access your website. It’s also cross-browser flexible and no ad-ons or plugins are required for flawless display and fast loading speed. For a great contrast between your multimedia content and the background of the site, Brooklyn comes with a PS color action set that will create chromatic harmony on your site.

If all features we talked about in this short review are new concepts for you, don’t worry! If you have no previous experience with WordPress or any other CMS and you barely know what a theme is, you will still be able to customize and manage the Brooklyn theme. That’s because of the extended video documentation collection. It contains everything you need to know about your site’s management, from installation to post scheduling.

More info / Download Demo

Brando

Brando has been created by a sharp team of creatives and developers seeking to provide a framework where webmasters can bring to life their wildest website dreams with ease.

This theme is one of the most complete packages for website building out there right now, taking you by the hand through the process of conceptual template selection, layout fine-tuning and element customization, right down to the finer details such as graphical embellishments, customizing your fonts and posts with high-resolution icons and enthralling animated transitions, and finally, going live with your website. Built on Bootstrap, Brando is natively responsive and cross-compatible with browsers, devices, and platforms the world over. Brando also comes with SEO friendly structure that will help your websites and projects climb the ranks of all the relevant searches in no time at all, netting you more traffic and more revenue overnight. Brando’s efficient coding makes it among the speediest, fastest-loading and most lightweight themes on the market. Try Brando today!

More info / Download Demo

Azoom

Firstly, Azoom is a refreshing and distinct WordPress theme, made for users who appreciate consistency and quality. It boasts a large roster of features, added in order to enhance and compliment any web page. It includes Special Grids, allowing customers to implement Parallax video backgrounds and other eye-catching features. Both highly functional and visually impressive, this theme is certainly worth your time. If you decide to purchase Azoom, you will gain a website that is entirely responsive. Three different breakpoints are offered in order to accommodate various devices. All site elements are guaranteed to adjust to the screens of your followers.

WooCommerce is one of the most prolific WordPress plugins, and Azoom has incorporated it. You may now craft an impressive online shop, allowing you to distribute your items and services. This increases your bottom line and promotes brand awareness. Thanks to the Rock Page Builder, users may now design interesting pages for each of their products. If you do not want to start from scratch, there is the option to import some demo content via the One Click Demo importer. Site admins can customize the page width, without needing to alter the code. This, you can achieve by accessing the Theme Options, and inputting the correct width.

More info / Download Demo

Monstroid

Monstroid is a popular theme for WordPress websites. It has a stunning design and a large roster of useful features. This product takes care of the heavy lifting, while you get to personalize every single aspect of your pages. Upon installation, Monstroid will have more than 100 layered PSD files. These files were optimized in order to fit the user’s needs.  In addition, there are several layout variations: full width, boxed, left sidebar, right sidebar, or no sidebar. The 2D interface of websites can get a little boring. Thankfully, Monstroid has implemented a Parallax scrolling option, and it generates a clever illusion of depth. This makes your site stand out, guaranteeing that it will have a place in any visitor’s memory.

Instead of having a bland, conventional background, Monstroid offers a modern video background. Basically, your page will transcend mediocrity. You can use gorgeous slides to display pictures, texts or videos. In between every slide, jaw-dropping animations will be present. This theme has several slider options, such as the Cherry Simple Slider and the MotoPress Slider. You can showcase your content on high-resolution Retina displays, and most web browsers. In addition, the layout is fully responsive towards tablets or smartphones.

More info / Download Demo

Bridge

Bridge is a premium theme that can be used for any site you might have planned. Regardless of your topic or niche, it has suitable and versatile functions that will help you create an engaging and interactive interface for your audience. The retina-ready display comes in use for making yourself accessible from any device, no matter on which operating system they run on.

In case you want to start an eCommerce project, the Bridge WordPress theme is one of the first things you need. Its design and code are compatible with many eCommerce plugins. The greatest one you can use in combination with this theme is WooCommerce. It has a minimal layout, with drop-down menus, suggestive icons, built-in side menus and many other attractive and functional design elements. In case you need this theme for a non-English website, there’s nothing to worry about. Even if it doesn’t come with a built-in translator, it’s compatible and ready for any WordPress multi-language pack, even with the free ones.

You will be able to create unlimited layouts with customization functions. The drag-and-drop page builder will let you simply pick the elements you want and build a unique layout in less than an hour. It has built-in vectorial icons, a library with over 600 Google fonts, a background slider for multimedia content and a collection of four fluid animated transition effects powered by AJAX.

You will be able to easily integrate this theme for SEO purposes. It’s built using WordPress and W3C validated HTML5, CCS3 and jQuery coding. These two features will assure an efficient SEO campaign, which will help you develop a much larger audience.

More info / Download Demo

BeTheme

The BeTheme is one of the most impressive multipurpose themes that can be bought for less than $60. There are currently 44 demos available on ThemeForest, from basic blogging and online portfolio to DJ and SPA websites. You can use this theme for every project and you won’t need to buy another one. The main features a premium WordPress theme should have. But let’s take a look at the core features of BeTheme.

Improved column grid with features even a 5 and a 6 column layout. This helps create a friendlier and engaging layout, which will convince your visitors to come back. The posts and content of your site will be displayed on the visitor’s device through the AJAX Load More function. They will simply hit the Load More button to display more items. This helps your site increase its loading speed, by loading items only when you need it.

With the Dual Sidebar feature, you will be able to have a sidebar on each side of your website. Best used in cases of a boxed layout. The sidebars are displayed on the space that’s already empty. The Grayscale effect of this theme will help you save loading time by rendering pictures only when the viewer accesses them. A greater collection of icons also come in the Muffin builder package. Now you can click on the icons you want to use when creating the layout. You’ll be able to create a similar theme derived from BeTheme. The Child Theme file also comes with the download package.

More info / Download Demo

Flatsome

Because of its increased popularity and requests from clients, the design team that created Flatsome has brought some modifications to it. It serves as an online shop theme (its main purpose), but you can customize it for any kind of website.

Optimized for Retina displays and it loads great on all screen sizes. Designed to be responsive on touchscreen devices. It’s also WooCommerce ready, but you can use any other eCommerce plugin on it. Moreover, it has all the features and functions that an online shop will need, and more. Your clients and visitors will have an amazing experience on your new site, if you’ll use this theme.

Flatsome will work for you, even if you never owned an online store before. It also allows you to single-handedly manage an online shop, with no need of outsourcing for the administration tasks. You will be able to easily add or remove products, descriptions and media content, without writing a single code line. Simply upload what you want to display and wait for your visitors to buy!

More info / Download Demo

Zemen


Due to its adaptability, versatility and ease of use, Zemen quickly became a popular WordPress theme. It is a multi-purpose theme for consulting businesses of all shapes and sizes. That said, if you would like to scale your business and attract more potential customers, Zemen is the tool you should utilize. Zemen has five multi-page and one single-page demo, as well as inner sections for about, services, blog and contact. In total, you are treated to over thirty pages that will form a complete and fully functional web space for your consulting firm.

Additionally, Zemen is retina- and translation-ready, entirely customizable, optimized for SEO and mobile-friendly. Your professional consulting website, built with Zemen, will push your expertness and get others to benefit from your effective services. Get online today and start making moves toward the desired goal you would like to reach this year.

More info / Download Demo

Seofy


If you are looking for a digital and online marketing specific tool to create a website with, Seofy is the popular high quality WordPress theme that you should take a peek at. It is a modern, clean and creative web design that will help you do your thing and realize your ideas as swiftly as possible. With the ready-made content and components, you can mix and match the available with your personal style and create a genuine experience from the very beginning.

Parallax effect, hexagon particles, Revolution Slider, WoCommerce ready and a whopping fifteen blog layouts, the goodies are there, you just need to utilize them. Seofy is also coupled with a WPBakery drag and drop website builder that offers both beginners and professionals a chance to create extraordinary websites. With no coding skills!

More info / Download Demo

Lightwire


Lightwire is a popular WordPress theme for construction and industrial companies and all other similar projects you run. It includes a bunch of different professional and sophisticated demos to choose from and other features and assets to implement in the design.

In total, Lightwire comes with over 35 ready-to-use page layouts, 75 components, thirteen headers, three portfolio variations and loads more other goodies. There are also premium plugins part of the deal, like Support Board, WPTF and Slider Revolution, for your convenience. With Lightwire, you can quickly design and develop a construction website and get your name out there. Persuade more clients and boost your business to new successes.

More info / Download Demo

Story

Story has a very stylish and modern design that goes well with any website, regardless of its topic or niche. The theme is versatile, easy to customize and is user-friendly. It also offers great management for any administrative, beginner or experienced website manager. Between the main features of this theme, we can find a fullscreen slider, custom background and headers, unlimited color schemes and easy content creation.

Combining a responsive design with the benefits of Parallax animations, Story is a theme that will be accessible from a large array of devices and screen sizes. Plus, it has cross-browser flexibility that will offer the features of your site to all visitors, regardless of the browser they use. What’s more, building a custom skin featuring your favorite colors is the simplest customization you can do within this theme. You can also change your site’s color scheme in the Admin Panel. It also comes with a series of switches and buttons. Used for one-click customization.

If you are unsure of what any of these features mean, just read Story’s extensive documentation, which comes with examples and self-explanatory screenshots.

More info / Download Demo

excerpt.rendered: Looking for the most popular and best WordPress themes out there? In this post, we have showcased the most popular themes you find today that are still actively updated and maintained. One of the first things you need to think…
